November: Exeter College Smoker]]'', featuring a cover illustration by J.R.R. Tolkien, is printed.

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1956]]''' - The first episode of [[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)
November: 1956 radio series]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' airs on the [[BBC]] Third Programme.

<noinclude>{{month: * '''[[1979]] - ''[[Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published in the US.'''
* '''[[2007]]''' - ''[[The Children of Húrin Signed Limited Edition]]'' is published.
* '''[[2012]]''' - The [[Tolkien Estate]], [[The Tolkien Trust]] and [[HarperCollins]] file another lawsuit with [[New Line Cinema]] and the [[Saul Zaentz Company]] over merchandising rights.
** [[Tuor]] and [[Voronwë]] pass the [[Seven Gates of Gondolin
November: Seven Gates]] to reach [[Gondolin]]. They are taken to [[Turgon]] who is told that they should abandon the city; Turgon decides to stay.
